thread.title: Spotify Hits a Flat Note

author: Dan Gallagher
title: Spotify Hits a Flat Note
text:
Every band knows, it pays to play the song everyone wants to hear.
For a new public company like Spotify, that tune is called the “Beat & Raise”—Wall Street parlance for beating stated goals and setting up even better new ones. But Spotify’s first quarterly report as a public company on Wednesday afternoon didn’t quite hit that note.
